name: ItazuraVR Safe for Work
description: Communication game watching women's livesThe cousin you used to play together suddenly came back and started to live next door. She has grown into a fine, young woman.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit versions only) Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: SteamVR
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
